title: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Characters for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Brush and brown watercolor on white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on image, lower right:  6
dimensions: 45.7 x 38.3 cm (18 1/16 x 15 1/16 in. ), irregular sheet
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Portion of Hebrew text, including partial  image of etrog (citron) at left edge.
